review: I am a PCOS patient struggling with infertility, but thanks to Dr. Shreeja Karanâ€™s guidance and treatment, I finally received a positive pregnancy result. Dr. Shreeja is incredibly humble, polite, and genuine. She has been with us throughout our journey, providing proper time for consultations and answering all my doubts. She is very polite and the right person to guide you for any infertility problem. Dr. Shreeja is the best fertility specialist to consult, as she is very supportive and understanding. Thank you, Dr. Shreeja, for your unwavering support and help!

Dr. Sreeja's professionalism was evident in her thoroughness and attention to detail. She conducted a comprehensive examination, leaving no stone unturned in her quest for an accurate  diagnosis 

In addition to her medical expertise, Dr. Sreeja displayed exceptional organizational skills and efficiency. The clinic was well-organized, with minimal waiting time, which further enhanced my overall experience. Her promptness and respect for her patients' time were truly commendable.

 I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sreeja 
to anyone seeking expert gynecological care, as she is undoubtedly  the best in her profession.

My wife and I recently visited SK Women's clinic, and we couldn't be happier with the experience and the outcome. From the moment we walked through the doors, we were greeted with warmth and professionalism by the entire staff.
Dr. Shreeja, is knowledgeable, compassionate, and patient. She took the time to explain every step of the process in detail, answered all our questions, and made us feel comfortable throughout the entire journey.

Thank you Dr. Shreeja!

We were so lucky to have Dr Shreja as our gynaec.  Thanks to her we have been blessed with twins.Not only is she an exceptional doctor but an amazing human being. We were not easy patients and had lots of questions, counter questions but she was always very patient with us. Also Dr Shreja was very responsive and available on whatsapp.No words are enough to thank you Dr.

Exceptional Gynaecologist !!!

Dr. Shreeja Karan is an extraordinary gynecologist surgeon who combines exceptional surgical skills with genuine care and compassion. Her professionalism, expertise, and dedication to her patients are truly remarkable.
We are incredibly grateful to have had Dr. Shreeja Karan as our surgeon and wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone in need of gynecological care.

*** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** ****** ***** **** **** She is very patient and clears all our doubts and her care for patients is very impressive.
I have followed everything as per doctor's suggestions (like medicines, food, lifestyle) and stayed completely healthy all over my pregnancy. She followed with me regularly and made sure that i am fine and healthy.

review: Dr. Shreeja takes time in understanding the issues and explains nicely. I have been under her supervision from past year and her diagnosis is good.

Doctor shreeja karan she is very caring, patince and too gental she was there throughout my prgenancy journey and used to clear all my doubts and she was reachable all the time we required because of her had very smooth delivery i would like to Highly recommend this Clinic to one and all.

Dr Shreeja has a warm personality and immediately makes one feel at home. I think she is excellently skilled at her work. I went to her for my first IUI after hearing success stories from a friend and after almost a year of trying, today I got my very first positive urine pregnancy test. I would highly recommend Dr Shreeja to everyone.

I've been Dr. Shreeja's patient for more than 2 years now. She has a talent for putting people at ease and I have seen her go the extra mile for her patients. Her expertise and finesse amazes me.
Recently, I contacted her with a health scare and she set up an appointment on the same day without delay. Not only did she treat my condition, but counselled me out of my fear. 
In my opinion, she's an amazing gynaecologist and a friend that every girl needs!
